recipe.title: Steak and Fries
recipe.description: Perfect medium-rare steak with crispy golden fries

steps.descr: Cut potatoes into fries, soak in cold water
steps.instructions: Cut potatoes into fries, soak in cold water

on_enter.say: Let's get started by cutting the potatoes into lovely fries and soaking them in cold water. This will help make them extra crispy later on.

steps.descr: Heat oil to 160°C, fry chips until soft, drain
steps.instructions: Heat oil to 160°C, fry chips until soft, drain

on_enter.say: Now, let's heat the oil to one hundred sixty degrees celsius. Fry the chips until they're soft, then drain them. You'll know they're ready when they start to look a bit golden.

steps.descr: Season steaks generously, let come to room temp
steps.instructions: Season steaks generously, let come to room temp

on_enter.say: Let's season those beautiful steaks generously with sea salt and black pepper. Let them come to room temperature for the best cooking results.

steps.descr: Heat pan until smoking, cook steaks 3-4 mins per side
steps.instructions: Heat pan until smoking, cook steaks 3-4 mins per side

on_enter.say: Heat your pan until it's smoking hot. We're going to cook the steaks for three to four minutes on each side. Listen for that sizzle!

steps.descr: Add butter, garlic, rosemary, baste steaks
steps.instructions: Add butter, garlic, rosemary, baste steaks

on_enter.say: Now, add the butter, garlic, and rosemary to the pan and baste the steaks. This will add incredible flavour and aroma.
Brilliant! Let the steaks rest for five minutes. This is really important as it lets all those lovely juices redistribute.

steps.descr: Fry chips again at 180°C until crispy, serve together
steps.instructions: Fry chips again at 180°C until crispy, serve together

on_enter.say: Time to fry the chips again at one hundred eighty degrees celsius until they're beautifully crispy. Then, serve them up with the steaks. Enjoy your meal!

notes.text:
Room temperature steak cooks more evenly
Double frying makes the crispiest chips
Don't skip the resting time
